title: N.H.I. (No Humans Involved) - 2nd Edition
description: Half of Treasure Valley is controlled by a violent street gang. The other half is controlled by fear. A rookie detective, Nate Richards, is thrust between the two.Abyss, a mysterious street gang, moves into the valley and people have started dying. Nate's girlfriend suddenly disappears and the gang is being targeted as the cause.Will Nate succumb to the pressure to get the job done by any means necessary, or will he become part of the problem and prove there are No Humans Involved? This eBook has been re-released under the title of "Notorious (A Nate Richards Mystery - Book One)"
author: Ray  Ellis
